code: import{useState,useContext}from"react";import mathCnDImage from"./images/MathCnD.jpg";import slcImage from"./images/SLC.jpg";import dcLibImage from"./images/DCLib.jpg";import{ThemeContext}from"./App";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Carousel(){const[offset,setOffset]=useState(0);const[transitionDirection,setTransitionDirection]=useState("Right");const images=[mathCnDImage,slcImage,dcLibImage];const{theme,toggleTheme}=useContext(ThemeContext);function transitionRight(e){setOffset(offset+1);setTransitionDirection("Right");}function transitionLeft(e){setOffset(offset+2);setTransitionDirection("Left");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Carousel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:"absolute",left:"12.5vw",width:"75vw",height:"30vw",overflow:"hidden",borderRadius:"1vw"},children:images.map((item,idx)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"CarouselImage  CarouselImage"+(offset+idx)%3+" CarouselImage".concat(transitionDirection),src:item,alt:"testImage"},idx);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:transitionRight,className:"CarouselRight ".concat(theme,"Background2"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-chevron-right ".concat(theme,"Text")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:transitionLeft,className:"CarouselLeft ".concat(theme,"Background2"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-chevron-left ".concat(theme,"Text")})}),images.map((item,idx)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"".concat(theme,"Background3 CarouselIndicator CarouselIndicator").concat(idx," CarouselIndicatorHighlight")+(idx-offset%3)},idx);})]});}export default Carousel;
